example.description: Demonstration of anchoring the edges of an element by mixing percentages with integers.
example.source: <a:window title = "Resize me" icon = "Glossary.png" visible = "true" width = "639" height = "300" resizable = "true" minwidth = "300" minheight = "200"> <a:bar left="15" top="15" right="40%+5" bottom="50%+10" /> <a:bar left="15" top="50%" right="40%+5" bottom="40" /> <a:bar left="60%+5" right="10" top="45" bottom="25" /> </a:window>
